createmultipleplugin.description: Contains the createmultipleplugin id that should be run when CreateMultiple is invoked

datasourcelogicalname.description: When creating a Data Provider, the end user must select the name of the Data Source entity that will be created for the provider.

description.description: What is this Data Provider used for and data store technologies does it target?

entitydataproviderid.description: Unique identifier of the data provider.

introducedversion.description: Version in which the form is introduced.

iscustomizable.description: Information that specifies whether this component can be customized.

name.description: The name of this Data Provider. This is the name that appears in the dropdown when creating a new entity.

retrieveentitychangesplugin.description: Contains the retrieveentitychangesplugin id that should be run when RetrieveEntityChanges is invoked

updatemultipleplugin.description: Contains the updatemultipleplugin id that should be run when UpdateMultiple is invoked

upsertmultipleplugin.description: Contains the upsertmultipleplugin id that should be run when UpsertMultiple is invoked

upsertplugin.description: Contains the upsertplugin id that should be run when Upsert is invoked

drmmetadata.description: Metadata optional object used to describe this entry.
